text: El Crucero de Santa María is a town in the municipality of San Martín de Hidalgo in the state of Jalisco, Mexico. It has a population of 3,228 inhabitants.PueblosAmerica.com - El Crucero de Santa María, San Martín Hidalgo, Jalisco ==References== ==External links== *El Crucero de Santa María at PueblosAmerica.com Category:Populated places in Jalisco
title: El Crucero de Santa María
